Articles.Content:
The forum monster destroyed this, thought I'd bring this back for now:

Download

Step 1: Download the .rar.

Step 2: Open the html file.

Step 3: Enjoy!

Thank you so much for doing this!! I'm glad someone had the foresight to archive a copy of it. At some point, you should transcribe it back into a proper forum post so that it can be updated as new partModules/fx/etc come out.

Thanks again!

you should

hoojiwana rebuilt it, it's now stickied in the Add On Development forum as it does cover more than modelling:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/25013-Compilation-of-modding-information-links-0-19
